propDescriptions.axisId: Id of the axis to render.
propDescriptions.classes: Override or extend the styles applied to the component. See CSS API below for more details.
propDescriptions.disableLine: If true, the axis line is disabled.
propDescriptions.disableTicks: If true, the ticks are disabled.
propDescriptions.fill: The fill color of the axis text.
propDescriptions.label: The label of the axis.
propDescriptions.labelFontSize: The font size of the axis label.
propDescriptions.stroke: The stroke color of the axis line.
propDescriptions.tickFontSize: The font size of the axis ticks text.

root.description: Styles applied to the root element.

tickContainer.nodeName: group ingruding the tick and its label
